items.sentence: Tom said Mary has only done that three times.
Tom said Mary has been told to do that again.
Tom told Mary that he'd be afraid to do that.
Tom told Mary that he was through doing that.
Tom told Mary that he was tempted to do that.
Tom told Mary that he was obliged to do that.
Tom told Mary it was safe for her to do that.
Tom thought Mary would be tempted to do that.
Tom thought Mary would be nervous doing that.
Tom thought Mary was the last one to do that.
